user.description:
Enter the IP address of your JetKVM device.

You must first SSH into the JetKVM and run api-setup.sh to install the API server.
user.title: JetKVM Integration Setup

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the JetKVM API on port 8800. Have you run api-setup.sh on the device?

abort.already_configured: This JetKVM device is already configured.
